Syntaxis: apic {{edit}} DIRECTORY

  De {{API Designer}} openen

  Opties
    DIRECTORY                        directory waarin API Designer wordt geopend (optioneel)

  De {{API Designer}} openen
    {{$ apic edit}}

  De {{API Designer}} openen in een LoopBack-toepassingsdirectory
    {{$ apic loopback --name climbon_application}}
    {{$ apic edit climbon_application}}
